title: German Empire
summary: The German Empire or the Imperial State of Germany,[lower-alpha 1][8][9][10][11] also referred to as Imperial Germany,[12] the Second Reich,[lower-alpha 2][13] the Kaiserreich, as well as simply Germany, was the period of the German Reich[14] from the unification of Germany in 1871 until the November Revolution in 1918, when the German Reich changed its form of government from a monarchy to a republic.[15][16]
